list.name: Changes
list.comment: Integrate Material-UI with custom theme, update README and rebuild guide for completion of Step 4

task.summary:
Add reusable `RechartsTimeSeriesChart` component for glucose trend visualization
- Implements a time series chart using Recharts to display glucose data with dynamic zoom, filters, and live mode options. - Adds dependencies for Recharts and supporting libraries. - Updates `package-lock.json` to reflect new dependencies.

Introduce `CLAUDE.md` technical documentation for project structure and development guidelines
- Adds comprehensive project vision, setup instructions, architectural overview, and API integration details. - Includes best practices for TypeScript, React, and project organization. - Outlines feature roadmap and deployment options.

Remove `EnhancedTimeSeriesChart` and `SimpleTimeSeriesChart`, refactor `SmartPollingAnalyzer` for optimized polling strategies
- Deletes legacy chart components in favor of a unified alternative. - Refines `SmartPollingAnalyzer` with simplified logic and improved efficiency for calculating confidence and intervals.
switched over to d3js for the main chart

Refactor `D3TimeSeriesChart`: simplify data handling, add initial zoom domain, and improve zoom behavior
- Replaces filtered data logic with full dataset usage. - Introduces `initialDomain` for better time range handling. - Enhances zoom and pan functionality with dynamic scale extents. - Updates stats calculation to respect selected time range.

Add clipping path, improve zoom/pan behavior, and enhance UX for `D3TimeSeriesChart`
- Introduces a clipping path to prevent rendering outside chart bounds. - Refines zoom/pan behavior with better scale extents, cursor feedback, and disabled double-click zoom. - Improves touch and drag handling with updated styles.

Enhance `D3TimeSeriesChart`: add user interaction state, refine Y-axis scaling, and improve zoom behavior
- Introduces `userHasInteracted` state to adjust auto-scaling and UX feedback. - Refines Y-axis scaling logic with visible data and padding for better visualization. - Updates zoom/pan behavior with unrestricted panning, wider zoom scale range, and initial zoom transformations.
started over and rebuilding from scratch
Add CGM service, API client, and types for handling glucose data and chart configurations
Update README, rebuild guide, and CLAUDE.md with progress on Steps 1-3 completion and next steps
Integrate Material-UI with custom theme, update README and rebuild guide for completion of Step 4

Add reusable `RechartsTimeSeriesChart` component for glucose trend visualization
- Implements a time series chart using Recharts to display glucose data with dynamic zoom, filters, and live mode options. - Adds dependencies for Recharts and supporting libraries. - Updates `package-lock.json` to reflect new dependencies.

Introduce `CLAUDE.md` technical documentation for project structure and development guidelines
- Adds comprehensive project vision, setup instructions, architectural overview, and API integration details. - Includes best practices for TypeScript, React, and project organization. - Outlines feature roadmap and deployment options.

- Deletes legacy chart components in favor of a unified alternative. - Refines `SmartPollingAnalyzer` with simplified logic and improved efficiency for calculating confidence and intervals.

Refactor `D3TimeSeriesChart`: simplify data handling, add initial zoom domain, and improve zoom behavior
- Replaces filtered data logic with full dataset usage. - Introduces `initialDomain` for better time range handling. - Enhances zoom and pan functionality with dynamic scale extents. - Updates stats calculation to respect selected time range.
